channel.title: Need help fixing up a client

item.title: Need help fixing up a client
item.dc:creator: @HowdyTrollet HowdyTrollet
item.description:
@HowdyTrollet wrote:

Hi Moparscape Forums,

I need help figuring out how to fix the compiler.bat and the run.bat for the first client within the list of two.
I only modified the version of java that it’s supposed to be using.
These two clients are pretty much fresh from the zip files.

1.)
:palm: The client that isn’t functioning

:|Compiler

@echo off
title Compiler
"C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.8.0_31\bin\javac.exe" *.java
pause

:|Run.bat

@echo off
TITLE Run
Java -Xmx500m client 0 0 highmem members 0
pause

:|Run.bat copy

@echo off
TITLE Run
"C:/Program Files (x86)/java/jre1.8.0_31/bin/java" -Xmx500m client 0 0 highmem members 0
pause

2.)
:palm:“The other functioning client”

:|Compiler.bat

@echo off
@TITLE Project Pk Compiler
if exist “%programfiles%\Java” (call :compile “%programfiles%\Java”) else (goto error)
:compile
for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe")
if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java)
if defined p (goto end)
:error
echo You Havent Downloaded Java :P…
:end
echo Finished!
pause
exit

:|Run.bat

@echo off
title Activated Project Pk
java -Xmx500m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server
exit

Read full topic
item.source: Need help fixing up a client
